chapter.text: 93|3|mcheasa robsa anak( ao mou ham meat)  minban baohbng anak ning  minban saabkhpaem anak laey .
93|4|chea karpit nasa  thngai barlok brasaer samreab anak cheang lokey nih towtiet .
93|5|haey mcheasa robsa anak pitchea nung bratan( nie k meat)aoy  anak .  haey anak brakadchea nung penh chetd cheaminkhan .
93|6|tae trong min bankheunh anak( mou ham meat) chea kaunkamprea  ning ban  theroksaa anak te ryy
93|7|haey trong bankheunh anak v nge  vng  ruoch trong ban changaoulobangheanh  phlauv dl anak te ryy
93|8|haey trong bankheunh anakchea anakakr  ruoch trong ban thveu aoy anak  mean ban te ryy
93|9|dau che  neah  chaur anak kom kiebasangkot champoh kaunkamprea aoy saoh .
93|10|haey chaur anak kom koumhk champoh anaksomtean aoy saoh .
93|11|rie nie k meat del mcheasa robsa anak ban bratan aoy noh  chaur anak riebreab( doengkoun) .
